p: The results in vitro showed that winter savory and peppermint essential oils can be effective bioherbicides. Peppermint essential oil at lower doses could be used to control L. multiflorum in rice. The emulsifiable concentrate based on winter savory essential oil tested in in vivo assays corroborates that this effective broad-spectrum herbicide constitutes an eco-friendly and less pernicious alternative to glyphosate in weed control.
